text: TEMPLE COLLEGE SCHOOL OF VOCATIONAL NURSING VNSG 1331: PHARMACOLOGY Objectives Module 3 Drugs that affect the Neuromuscular and Peripheral Nervous Systems Chapters 24, 25, 26, 27, & 30 1. Discuss the actions, uses, adverse reactions, contraindications, precautions, and interactions of various drugs that affect the neuromuscular and peripheral nervous systems. 2. Implement important pre-administration and ongoing focused assessment activities the nurse should perform on the patient taking drugs that affect the neuromuscular and peripheral nervous systems. 3. Use the nursing process to implement care for a patient receiving drugs that affect the neuromuscular and peripheral nervous systems. 4. List the actions that sympathetic and parasympathetic neurohormones have on the body. 5. Identify important points to keep in mind when educating patients and families about the use of the drugs covered in this module.
